005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.AbstractCodedMetapathException;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.IItem;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.node.INodeItem;
011
012import java.util.Locale;
013
014import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
015
016/**
017 * FOTY: Exceptions related to type errors.
018 */
019public class InvalidTypeFunctionException
020    extends AbstractCodedMetapathException {
021  /**
022   * <a href=
023   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#ERRFOTY0012">err:FOTY0012</a>:
024   * Raised by
025   * <a href="https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-data">fn:data</a>, or
026   * by implicit atomization, if applied to a node with no typed value, the main
027   * example being an element validated against a complex type that defines it to
028   * have element-only content.
029   */
030  public static final int NODE_HAS_NO_TYPED_VALUE = 12;
031
032  /**
033   * <a href=
034   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#ERRFOTY0013">err:FOTY0013</a>:
035   * Raised by
036   * <a href="https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-data">fn:data</a>, or
037   * by implicit atomization, if the sequence to be atomized contains a function
038   * item.
039   */
040  public static final int DATA_ITEM_IS_FUNCTION = 13;
041  /**
042   * <a href=
043   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#ERRFOTY0014">err:FOTY0014</a>:
044   * Raised by fn:string, or by implicit string conversion, if the input sequence
045   * contains a function item.
046   */
047  public static final int ARGUMENT_TO_STRING_IS_FUNCTION = 14;
048
049  /**
050   * the serial version UUID.
051   */
052  private static final long serialVersionUID = 1L;
053
054  /**
055   * Constructs a new exception with the provided {@code code}, {@code item}, and
056   * no cause.
057   *
058   * @param code
059   *          the error code value
060   * @param item
061   *          the item the exception applies to
062   */
063  public InvalidTypeFunctionException(int code, @NonNull IItem item) {
064    super(code, generateMessage(item));
065  }
066
067  /**
068   * Constructs a new exception with the provided {@code code}, {@code item}, and
069   * {@code cause}.
070   *
071   * @param code
072   *          the error code value
073   * @param item
074   *          the item the exception applies to
075   * @param cause
076   *          the original exception cause
077   */
078  public InvalidTypeFunctionException(int code, @NonNull IItem item, Throwable cause) {
079    super(code, generateMessage(item), cause);
080  }
081
082  private static String generateMessage(@NonNull IItem item) {
083    String retval;
084    if (item instanceof INodeItem) {
085      INodeItem nodeItem = (INodeItem) item;
086      retval = String.format("The %s node item at path '%s' has no typed value",
087          nodeItem.getNodeItemKind().name().toLowerCase(Locale.ROOT),
088          nodeItem.getMetapath());
089    } else {
090      retval = String.format("Item '%s' has an improperly typed value", item.getClass().getName());
091    }
092    return retval;
093  }
094
095  @Override
096  public String getCodePrefix() {
097    return "FOTY";
098  }
099}
